definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: He is now a researcher at Instiute For Arts & Literature Trend of People's University of China.

sentences.english: Zhang Linhua, female, Chinese People's University master, at present doctor is reading.

sentences.english: A student of oil painting in Renmin University of China.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民大學徐悲鴻藝術學院在校學生，油畫專業。
